Public Member Functions

 child_element (size_t index)

Detailed Description

Stream command to add a child element to the current path.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

imaging::XmlReader::child_element::child_element ( size_t  index  )  [inline]

Passing this element to an XML input stream adds index-th child element of the current element to the current path.
